title: Mobile-Based Network Engineering Practical Skills Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic network theory and protocol comprehension
context.additional_context: Mobile-based learning for professionals to acquire network practice skills directly applicable to their work, with learner-centered activities via BYOD.

learning_goals: Using the PT Anywhere platform, learners perform routing and switching configuration practice without physical network equipment.
Through learning analytics, learners analyze individual practice performance results and establish improvement plans.
Via team-based projects, learners design and implement virtual network infrastructure in a cloud environment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
